---
name: rails-solid-stack
description: Use when implementing background jobs (Solid Queue), caching (Solid Cache), or WebSockets (Solid Cable) in Rails 8. Ensures proper patterns for the new default infrastructure.
triggers:
  - Background jobs
  - Solid Queue
  - Caching
  - Solid Cache
  - WebSockets
  - Solid Cable
  - Action Cable
  - ActiveJob
